title: L&T Finance, L&T Infra Credit and 5 other NBFCs surrender certificates of registration
description: L&T Finance, L&T Infra Credit, and five other non-banking financial companies (NBFCs) have surrendered their certificates of registration to the Reserve Bank of India. Following this, the central bank cancelled their Certificate of Registration (CoR) as they ceased to be a legal entity after amalgamation, merger, dissolution or voluntary strike-off.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
